name: @tjr-suite/db-simple
description: Minimal database connection and migration runner for SQLite and PostgreSQL

scripts.migrate:sqlite: node -e "const db = require('./dist/index.js'); db.connect('sqlite:data/dev.db').then(conn => db.runMigrations('./migrations/sqlite', conn, { logger: console }).then(() => conn.close()))"
scripts.migrate:postgres: node -e "const db = require('./dist/index.js'); if(!process.env.DATABASE_URL){console.error('DATABASE_URL required');process.exit(1)}; db.connect(process.env.DATABASE_URL).then(conn => db.runMigrations('./migrations/postgres', conn, { logger: console }).then(() => conn.close()))"
